text: Ogaid na so mithatakna ko katao a pd kiran, go so miyamaratiyaya, na paparatiyayaan iran so (kitab a) initoron rka (ya Mohammad) go so initoron ko miyaonaan ka: Go ipphamayandg iran so sambyang go pthonayn iran so zakat go paparatiyayaan iran so Allah go so alongan a mawri: Na siran man na mbgan Ami siran dn sa balas a mala
